name: COLONIAL VALLEY ABSTRACT COMPANY and Abstract Land Associates, Inc. v. HOMESTEAD INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Colonial Valley Abstract Co. v. Homestead Insurance

parties: COLONIAL VALLEY ABSTRACT COMPANY and Abstract Land Associates, Inc. v. HOMESTEAD INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Dennis J. Roman, Pittsburgh, for Homestead Ins.
Mark D. Bradshaw, James J. Kutz, Harrisburg, for Colonial Valley Co.
casebody.head_matter:
658 A.2d 789
COLONIAL VALLEY ABSTRACT COMPANY and Abstract Land Associates, Inc. v. HOMESTEAD INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 27, 1995.
Decided May 19, 1995.
Dennis J. Roman, Pittsburgh, for Homestead Ins.
Mark D. Bradshaw, James J. Kutz, Harrisburg, for Colonial Valley Co.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
